description: 2BD/1.5BA house near Alma Schrader elementary school with one car carport.  Home has a walkout, finished basement with two rooms, half bath, and laundry room. Comes with a refrigerator and gas stove.  Central A/C, gas heat, and water heater.  Large fenced back yard.  Small pet, under 20 pounds, accepted with additional fees.   In the Alma Schrader district. Minimum Deposit $925.00.
